```
------请求行------
GET / HTTP/1.1\r\n

---请求头--------
Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,*/*;q=0.8,application/signed-exchange;v=b3;q=0.9\r\n
Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate\r\n
Accept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.9\r\n
Cache-Control: max-age=0\r\n
Connection: keep-alive\r\n
Cookie: BIDUPSID=B1E364CCCAF37B388480470D85B7E844; PSTM=1658579455; BD_UPN=12314753; BAIDUID=B1E364CCCAF37B3886B2421827FBE768:SL=0:NR=10:FG=1; sugstore=0; sug=3; ORIGIN=0; bdime=0; __yjs_duid=1_dbb5e20c5fc85b89634ab61780ce72b71660891094612; BDORZ=B490B5EBF6F3CD402E515D22BCDA1598; BA_HECTOR=24050k800g8421a12h8hahcb1hqo0n61j; ZFY=v1AylkcChZ4PIT0fXp:ASbR11nId2Xm:B5T1W7BDkcORY:C; BAIDUID_BFESS=B1E364CCCAF37B3886B2421827FBE768:SL=0:NR=10:FG=1; B64_BOT=1; Hm_lvt_aec699bb6442ba076c8981c6dc490771=1672122269,1672217538,1672220172,1672221532; __bid_n=184f0d9822b7cc85384207; FEID=v10-77269bb6ee8786b3e0abbe06d5c997dda1aeadd9; __xaf_fpstarttimer__=1672221587658; __xaf_ths__={"data":{"0":1,"1":43200,"2":60},"id":"d2c191c2-0a3e-483a-ab4d-4945c0a54a7f"}; __xaf_thstime__=1672221587717; |U/DcUP8BbyvBdshh1/t6e4AqI+iew+C9LsPDFbPFFlM=|10|0747963ee468468930aeaf924211dee8; __xaf_fptokentimer__=1672221587752; RT="z=1&dm=baidu.com&si=jxiqlry94h&ss=lc7hk261&sl=5&tt=1yz&bcn=https%3A%2F%2Ffclog.baidu.com%2Flog%2Fweirwood%3Ftype%3Dperf&ld=k9o&ul=qyu&hd=qzi"; ab_sr=1.0.1_N2E0ZjZjYTQ2ZGJkMzkzMGViMzM3ODYyMzAxODZhNDhmM2U1ZTk1NjU1NmEzMzFjMjQxMGJjODFhODNjNjY2MGZjODcwNDUzN2IzMDY5YmJjNThlYTdhZmUwYTg2MWU0M2M0YzY3MjMwMTY5ZDNlOWExMzM4ODBjZWNjZGM3YTNkNDExMjZiZTM4OWYzZTNiZTIyYWZiMmQ2MmJiZGQxYQ==; baikeVisitId=66c09379-58d3-4d03-8cc3-58f81e73f763; COOKIE_SESSION=1981_7_9_9_21_12_0_2_6_5_0_4_1961_333_3_0_1672226229_1672221534_1672226226%7C9%23312_73_1672221521%7C9; BD_HOME=1; H_PS_PSSID=36545_37647_37685_37907_38015_37623_36921_37989_37799_36807_37948_37925_37952_37902_26350_37881
Host: www.baidu.com
Sec-Fetch-Dest: document
Sec-Fetch-Mode: navigate
Sec-Fetch-Site: none
Sec-Fetch-User: ?1
Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/108.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
sec-ch-ua: "Not?A_Brand";v="8", "Chromium";v="108", "Google Chrome";v="108"
sec-ch-ua-mobile: ?0
sec-ch-ua-platform: "Windows"\r\n

-----空行----------
\r\n


回车(\r):CR:ASCII码表示13 把打印头定位在行首
换行(\n) : 把打印纸向下移动一行
```

- GET请求报文

  - 请求行
  - 请求头
  - 空行

- POST请求报文

  - 请求行

  - 请求头

  - 空行

  - 请求体

  - ```
    {"data":"","key_id":"560c28f2c82243fd","enc":2}
    ```

    

- HTTP响应报文

  - ```
    ----响应行/状态行---
    HTTP/1.1 200 OK\r\n
    307 重定向
    400 错误的请求，请求的地址或者参数有误
    404 请求的资源在服务器中不存在
    500 服务器内部源代码出问题
    
    ---响应头--
    Bdpagetype: 1\r\n
    Bdqid: 0xc7460ca00001f606\r\n
    Connection: keep-alive\r\n
    Content-Encoding: gzip\r\n
    Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8\r\n
    Date: Wed, 28 Dec 2022 12:13:50 GMT\r\n
    Server: BWS/1.1\r\n
    Set-Cookie: BDSVRTM=0; path=/
    Set-Cookie: BD_HOME=1; path=/
    Set-Cookie: H_PS_PSSID=36545_37647_37685_37907_38015_37623_36921_37989_37799_36807_37948_37925_37952_37902_26350_37881; path=/; domain=.baidu.com
    Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=172800
    Traceid: 1672229630023779380214359178343251834374
    X-Frame-Options: sameorigin
    X-Ua-Compatible: IE=Edge,chrome=1
    Transfer-Encoding: chunked
    -----空行-----
    
    ----响应体-----
    <!DOCTYPE html><!--STATUS OK--><html><head><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html;charset=utf-8"><meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1"><meta content="always" name="referrer"><meta name="theme-color" content="#ffffff"><meta name="description" content="全球领先的中文搜索引擎、致力于让网民更便捷地获取信息，找到所求。百度超过千亿的中文网页数据库，可以瞬间找到相关的搜索结果。"><link rel="shortcut icon" href="/favicon.ico" type="image/x-icon" />
    ```

    

- 响应行由三个部分组成
  - HTTP协议版本
  - 状态码
  - 状态描述
- 响应报文
  - 响应行
  - 响应头
  - 空行
  - 响应体
